morning.text: Today I choose joy and thanksgiving, rejoicing in the day the Lord has made and welcoming His goodness with gratitude. My heart is steadfast in Him.  And, today i seek the lord’s wisdom and welcome his guidance, trusting him to order my steps in all i do.

Today I put on love and compassion, seeing others through the eyes of Christ and serving with a willing heart. I receive this by faith and walk in it.  Also, today i choose joy and thanksgiving, rejoicing in the day the lord has made and welcoming his goodness with gratitude.
Today I put on love and compassion, seeing others through the eyes of Christ and serving with a willing heart. I am covered by His steadfast love.
Today I receive the Lord’s provision and favor, confident that He supplies all my needs and surrounds me with His love. I receive this by faith and walk in it.

Today I seek the Lord’s wisdom and welcome His guidance, trusting Him to order my steps in all I do. By His grace, I will not fear.  Furthermore, today i choose joy and thanksgiving, rejoicing in the day the lord has made and welcoming his goodness with gratitude.

Today I dwell in God’s shelter and shine His light boldly, empowered by His Spirit to witness with grace. I welcome His presence and obey His leading.  Also, today i walk boldly in the purpose god prepared for me, trusting his plans and partnering with his grace.

Today I receive the Lord’s provision and favor, confident that He supplies all my needs and surrounds me with His love. By His grace, I will not fear.  Furthermore, today i stand secure in my identity in christ—chosen, redeemed, and made new for his purpose and glory.
